content: **january 2021** happy new year all congratulations for surviving 2020 to ensure a happy start i am making all my patterns free to download enjoy **april 23 2017** **brain hats at the science march ** i saw so many brain hats at the science marches across the country yesterday it was awesome when i first heard about brain hats being knitted for the science march back in january i decided to make the pattern a free download as my way of showing support since then there were **over 12 700 downloads ** i m so happy that people were able to express their love and support of science and research through the brain hat and by coming together for such a worthy cause keep using those wonderful brains to come up with amazing new ideas and solutions to our world s problems **jan 27th 2017** **brain hats for science ** i ve heard from a few people over the last few days that some science-inclined knitters have been planning to make brain hats for the potential scientist march on double_crochet similar to the pussy hats for the women s march - which is awesome as a lover of nature and wilderness a scientist bs in biology and a physician and surgeon science plays a big role in my life - so as a show of support i will be making the brain hat pattern a **free ravelry download from now until the day of the march** so get a copy get some yarn and get your science on **sept 28th 2012** i will reiterate **this is not an actual hat for sale ** i don t know how much more plainly i can state this i also do not take commissions to make brain hats due to time constraints while in school although with all the demand i d probably make more money selling brain hats than the first 10 years of practicing medicine if you are looking for a brain hat to purchase you can check out brain hats made by juliaprickle 1 at goodsmiths 2 and etsy 3 please note that jane s creations 4 is no longer making brain hats for now but will post on her facebook page if that changes thank you everyone for your continued enthusiasm and encouraging words **jan 31 2011** quick note please know this is a **knitting pattern** not an actual hat for sale **i do not have any hats for sale** unfortunately medical school takes up enough of my time that i am unable to make any hats for sale at this point my best recommendation is to find a friend or family member that knits and bribe them with some delicious cookies also shout out to zealofzebra and the very first brain hat 7 pics of her project were published in the book 1 000 fabulous knit hats 8 thank you i really appreciate everyone s comments and support **nov 11 2011** a note with the skull cap part
